content: SD 4500 Drywall screwdriver Corded drywall screwdriver with 4500 rpm for drywall applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Convenient and easy to operate with excellent working comfort Two tools in one – ready for magazine operation in a flash (magazine optional) Quick-release system makes changing bit holders and magazines easier than ever Depth gauge or screw magazine can be quickly removed for fastening drywall track Directional venting helps to prevent dust from blowing into the operator’s face Applications Fastening drywall boards to metal or wood framing on walls and ceilings Fastening wood boards to metal or wood framing on walls and ceilings Fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal or wood framing on walls and ceilings Fastening metal studs to metal tracks ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. torque: 7 ft-lbs Rated voltage: 120 V Weight: 3.1 lb. Technical Data | Max. torque | 7 ft-lbs | Rated voltage | 120 V | Weight | 3.1 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 11.4 x 3 x 6.6 in ### ITEMS- 3523412 - Drywall screwdriver SD 4500 50ft Multi-Pack - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: -
